biography: Mila is a visionary who builds new worlds. As an AR/VR Developer, she lives and breathes the metaverse, crafting immersive digital experiences that blur the line between reality and illusion. Her creativity is boundless, and her technical skill allows her to translate the most fantastical ideas into interactive virtual spaces. She is a true digital native, often more comfortable in a virtual environment than in the real world.

facial.hairStyle: A sharp undercut with longer hair on top, often styled playfully
facial.mouth: A small mouth with a prominent cupid's bow

tattoos: A pixelated heart tattoo on the inside of her right wrist.
piercings: Both earlobes pierced, plus a helix and industrial piercing on her left ear.

chest.description: Perky, round B-cup breasts with pale, sensitive areolae.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Slim and flat, but soft to the touch. Navel is a very small 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hips: Slender, giving her a petite, almost boyish figure.
bodyDetails.arms: Thin and pale, with little muscle definition.
bodyDetails.legs: Slender and well-proportioned for her height.
bodyDetails.hands: Small and nimble, with nails often painted with pixel art or glitter.

private.pubicHairStyle: a small, dyed pastel pink triangle

quirks: Sometimes forgets which reality she is in
Sees UI elements in the real world
Expresses herself with video game terminology
Owns a collection of retro consoles

relationships.katje-05: Relies on her for aesthetic guidance in her virtual worlds
